analysis.career_trajectory: Started with JavaScript in 2021, focusing on React and React Query. In 2022, they started exploring TypeScript and Tailwind-in-JS. They also experimented with different frameworks like Remix and Astro. By 2023, they had gained experience with authentication and performance optimization. Their recent work includes building global async server-state management and creating a concise API for exploratory data visualization.

Their use of TypeScript and exploration of its features suggests an interest in type systems.
